top10_tweets_like: Did you know the latest version of ggplot2 allows you to set the default colour/fill scale functions via global options? Since the version was a minor update, there was no release blog post, so you might not notice this big news... Thanks so much @cpsievert! #rstats https://t.co/XN7yqFYvVX

Feel free to use this #ggplot2 cheat sheet to quickly find the right aesthetics for your geoms.

Feedback and improvements welcome #rstats

https://t.co/WmuAC5i5rx https://t.co/0e83VRpvYH

In addition, you can now also set discrete colour/fill scale defaults via a vector (or list) of colour codes. Super useful for providing colour-blind safe defaults! #rstats https://t.co/7AwMsfEv3V https://t.co/jHMPC86pco
